author: gbrown
msg: Minor updates to Color Scheme Builder; add Color Scheme Builder to demos; fix minor naming issues in demo XML files.

author: mattmann
msg: - fix for NUTCH-855 ScoringFilter and IndexingFilter: To allow for the propagation of URL Metatags and their subsequent indexing

author: rjung
msg: Fix broken header file installation for VPATH build.
Some header files are generated during build, e.g.
apr_ldap.h and apu_want.h. Those header files need
to be picked up from the build dir during installation.
For a VPATH build, build dir and source dir are not the same.

author: rjung
msg: Since APU has been merged with APR, the header file apu.h
is no longer dynamically generated during the build.
It only contains a fixed include of apr.h.

author: rjung
msg: Fix order of elements in struct.
Was broken by reordering in struct definition (r900089).
